settings.title: Sign up for tips & tricks
settings.richtext: Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways and training tips and fitness news.

settings.subtitle: Brand new
settings.title: My fitness journey
settings.text:
I am Alina, a qualified fitness professional and an all-time cheerleader for healthy lifestyle without harsh diets, magic pills and fake promises.

As a former professional dancer (over 10 years of ballet training in a Russian Theatre of Dance, winner at International Dance Competitions and at one point owner of a dance school in Ireland), I moved fully into the fitness industry over 8 years ago. Today I am based in London, one of the fitness capitals, sculpting bodies and changing lives.

My bespoke programs are designed to give women their desired results, should it be weight loss, toning, bulking without compromise on mobility and agility of the body. Based on physiology, coupled with years of experience, most of my plans target ladies' most troublesome areas; think bums, tums and thighs.

Whatever your goal is, I have got you covered! xx

settings.subtitle: About me
settings.title: My fitness journey
settings.text:
I am Alina, a qualified fitness professional and an all-time cheerleader for healthy lifestyle without harsh diets, magic pills and fake promises.

As a former professional dancer (over 10 years of ballet training in a Russian Theatre of Dance, winner at International Dance Competitions and at one point owner of a dance school in Ireland), I moved fully into the fitness industry over 8 years ago. Today I am based in London, one of the fitness capitals, sculpting bodies and changing lives.

My bespoke programs are designed to give women their desired results, should it be weight loss, toning, bulking without compromise on mobility and agility of the body. Based on physiology, coupled with years of experience, most of my plans target ladies' most troublesome areas; think bums, tums and thighs.

Whatever your goal is, I have got you covered! xx

settings.testimonial: Simply genius, best workout program i have ever used. I cant wait for the next one!
settings.author: Kristina A

settings.testimonial: I never thought it would be possible to get my body back after pregnancy. Your amazing.
settings.author: Maria S

settings.testimonial: This has become my fitness guide. I have seen so much change and I feel strong.
settings.author: Galia D

settings.subtitle: About me
settings.title: My fitness journey
settings.text:
I am Alina, a qualified fitness professional and an all-time cheerleader for healthy lifestyle without harsh diets, magic pills and fake promises.

As a former professional dancer (over 10 years of ballet training in a Russian Theatre of Dance, winner at International Dance Competitions and at one point owner of a dance school in Ireland), I moved fully into the fitness industry over 8 years ago. Today I am based in London, one of the fitness capitals, sculpting bodies and changing lives.

My bespoke programs are designed to give women their desired results, should it be weight loss, toning, bulking without compromise on mobility and agility of the body. Based on physiology, coupled with years of experience, most of my plans target ladies' most troublesome areas; think bums, tums and thighs.

Whatever your goal is, I have got you covered! xx

For any media or brand enquiries, or to book me for a speaking engagement please email my manager: Francesca Zampi francesca@thefound.co.uk

All E-mails are personally answered by me again 24 hours. Please check junk/spam mail. Feel free to ask me anything, I am here to help.
